description: Tree works at front of property subject to London Borough of Islington Tree Preservation Order no.168 1997.   WORKS: ELM (T1)            - crown lift over site to 6m and                       deadwood. TREE OF HEAVEN (T2) - crown lift over site to 6m, cut back                       extended overhang over site and                       deadwood. LIMES (T3;T4 & T5)  - crown lift to 7m, remove horizontal                       laterals growing directly across site                       and deadwood.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS 3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
